name: Ovato
description: Ovato is a decentralized financial project with a singular focus on achieving mass adoption on a global scale for its utility coin, OVATO, by building a seamless, full-circle, and highly incentivized economy. The project is fundamentally about providing a next-generation digital currency designed for everyday, real-life use, serving as a secure, efficient, and appreciative alternative to traditional financial systems. The core function is to facilitate the exchange of value in a truly permissionless, non-custodial, and decentralized way, leveraging blockchain technology. Ovato addresses critical inefficiencies and high costs associated with conventional banking, particularly by offering a low-cost solution for merchants who face transaction fees as high as 9% to 18% in traditional systems.
